name: Convert Number in Tibetan
author: Pema Zomkyi

sections.description: The plugin helps to convert number from english to Tibetan. Number on date, time and comment number will convert to Tibetan.
sections.installation:
Using The WordPress Dashboard

  1. Navigate to the \’Add New\’ in the plugins dashboard
  2. Search for \’Convert Number in Tibetan\’
  3. Click \’Install Now\’
  4. Activate the plugin on the Plugin dashboard

Uploading in WordPress Dashboard

  1. Navigate to the \’Add New\’ in the plugins dashboard
  2. Navigate to the \’Upload\’ area
  3. Select convert-number-in-tibetan.zip from your computer
  4. Click \’Install Now\’
  5. Activate the plugin in the Plugin dashboard

Using FTP

  1. Download convert-number-in-tibetan.zip
  2. Extract the convert-number-in-tibetan.zip directory to your computer
  3. Upload the convert-number-in-tibetan directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  4. Activate the plugin in the Plugin dashboard

short_description: The plugin helps to convert number from english to Tibetan
description: The plugin helps to convert number from english to Tibetan. Number on date, time and comment number will convert to Tibetan.

tags.english-to-tibetan-date-and-time: English to Tibetan Date and Time
